apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the kiss: person, woman, medium-skin-tone emoji depicts a woman with a warm, rosy complexion leaning forward with her lips pursed. The Apple design language imbues her face with soft, rounded edges and a gentle sheen, suggesting a tender and affectionate gesture. Her closed eyes convey a sense of sweet sincerity, making this emoji on Apple devices a perfect way to send a loving peck or express deep fondness in a message.
